note.p: Career: Practised in Amsterdam (1680-1693), in which period he performed some 1400 lithotomies; Professor of Anatomy, Surgery and Medicine at Frankeer (1693-1695); invited to London (1695) to perform a lithotomy on Thomas Millington, Surgeon to the King; set up a very successful practice in London
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; Hunter; Jocher; Hirsch; Munk's roll; BIB
Notes: Proposed by Sir Hans Sloane
